thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 7 of 122
thread.title: Michael Spencer

author: Michael Spencer
title: Michael Spencer
text: Being a sad old 'git' I trawled through 12 pages of reviews to try and find some bad ones and, lo and behold, just one single star review. All the rest were 4 or 5 stars ... I don't really understand the 4 star reviews as, having been a customer of Dial-a-Flight's for more years than I care to remember I would go off the scale if I could and give them, and in particular Ryan, 6, 7 or 8 stars. Our latest trip to New Zealand and Aitutaki was the usual 'well-oiled machine' and Ryan triumphed again with the Aitutaki accommodation. I can only repeat ... "✮✮✮✮✮ Excellent – no reservations, I would recommend this company to anyone"
